modals.aboutSpreadText: These 7 cards; It makes visible your current situation, strengths, obstacles and opportunities. It offers a road map that activates your inner potential‚Äîa clear and compassionate bridge from today to tomorrow.
modals.cardCountText: Total 7 cards: (1) Current Status (2) Strengths (3) Obstacles (4) Opportunities (5) Resources/Support (6) Roadmap (7) Conclusion & Recommendation.
modals.creditConfirmMessage: Credit will be used for this career expansion. Are you sure you want to continue?

modals.loveAttention: After recording the reading, I usually email your personal comment within 2‚Äì4 hours. This study is for guidance purposes only; The final choices are yours.

position1.upright: Joker says he is on the verge of a new beginning in his career path. You can boldly step into areas that excite your heart. If your current path does not satisfy you, it may be time to move in a new direction that will nourish your freedom.
position1.reversed: Inverted Joker indicates that unplanned steps can bring disappointment. Maybe your current career isn't right for you, but hastily choosing a new path just for a change is risky.
position1.context: Your desire to find the free space your heart desires in your career path is at the forefront.

position2.upright: Joker advises you to take a bold step towards development. Turning to new projects, different fields or methods you have never tried can give you great momentum in your career.
position2.reversed: Inverted Joker reminds you that steps taken without thinking can strain you. Planning a little before you take the step will empower you.
position2.context: To develop your career, you must make a bold but conscious start.

position3.upright: Joker reminds you that the unexpected surprises you encounter on your career path and the spontaneous flow of life are not under your control. Some opportunities and risks develop outside of you.
position3.reversed: The reversed Joker tells you that you cannot completely escape the uncertainties that life brings you. Lack of planning can strain you.
position3.context: You can't plan everything in your career; Surprising developments will be out of your control.

position4.upright: Joker shows that he proceeds with his work with sincerity and curiosity. You are open to trying new things and this makes your performance unique.
position4.reversed: The inverted Joker indicates that you are not expressing your full energy due to carelessness or unplanned steps.
position4.context: You are progressing with a free spirit in your current career, but your efforts will be more valuable if you are more planned.

position5.upright: Joker, you can create change in your career by taking bold steps and trying new things. Being open to taking risks takes you forward.
position5.reversed: Inverted Joker, you should avoid taking rash steps. Change is beneficial when it is planned.
position5.context: Bold innovation in your career will help you, but you should stay away from lack of planning.

position6.upright: Joker: Your thoughtless or unplanned steps in the past may create uncertainties in your current career path.
position6.reversed: Inverted Joker, your tendency to avoid taking risks in the past may prevent you from taking advantage of opportunities today.
position6.context: Uncontrolled or courageous steps in the past affect your current career path.

position7.upright: Joker shows that the outcome of your career journey will be shaped by freedom and new beginnings. Your future will present you with exciting opportunities.
position7.reversed: Inverted Joker may indicate failure to fully utilize opportunities due to carelessness or lack of planning.
position7.context: The result of your career journey will be to turn a new page and discover your freedom.

position1.upright: The wizard indicates a period in which you can reveal your potential. Your creativity, communication power and willpower can carry you to success in your career. If your current path supports this energy, you are on the right track.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Magician may indicate that you are using your talents in the wrong direction or are in a job that limits your potential. In this case, your current career may be consuming you.
position1.context: You need to question whether you are using your own power in the right place.

position2.upright: The wizard says that you must actively use the skills you have in your career. Making your talents more visible and strengthening your communication skills will speed up your steps.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Magician indicates that underestimating or misusing your abilities will set you back. To improve, you must first believe in yourself.
position2.context: To develop your career, you must use the resources you have skillfully.

position3.upright: The magician shows that the timing of opportunities coming to you is not always in your hands. The right environment sometimes depends on external factors.
position3.reversed: Reversed Magician, manipulations or misdirection by others are elements you cannot control.
position3.context: You can't always choose the moment in your career when you take the stage; conditions take effect.

position4.upright: The magician shows that he reflects his potential into his work and uses his resources efficiently. You're really doing your best.
position4.reversed: Reversed Mage, you may underestimate or misuse your abilities. This causes its performance not to be fully reflected.
position4.context: Your current endeavor becomes the best when you use the skills you have correctly.

position5.upright: The magician shows that he can create change by making his skills more visible and strengthening his communication.
position5.reversed: Reverse Magician, you should increase your performance by focusing instead of using your energy scatteredly.
position5.context: To contribute to your career, you must demonstrate your skills in a focused manner.

position6.upright: Sorcerer, not using your full potential in the past may have slowed down your development today.
position6.reversed: Reversed Magician, past manipulation or misdirection may be limiting your current career.
position6.context: Not being able to use your power fully or being misled in the past affects the present.

position7.upright: The magician indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be to achieve success through the skillful use of your skills.
position7.reversed: When the Reversed Magician does not use his full potential, the result may be incomplete or misleading.
position7.context: The result will be to achieve a strong position in your career by demonstrating your creativity and skills.

position1.upright: The High Priestess says you should listen to your intuition. Your current career may be satisfying your mind, but if your heart whispers something else, the answer is hidden in your inner world.
position1.reversed: The Reversed High Priestess indicates that she suppresses her intuition and acts solely on external expectations. This path may be safe, but it may not satisfy you.
position1.context: You will find your real career answer where your heart whispers.

position2.upright: The High Priestess recommends listening to your intuition and deepening your knowledge for your growth. Education, research, or inner exploration guides you through this process.
position2.reversed: The Reverse High Priestess says that when you suppress your inner voice, you can go astray. Pay attention to your intuition to improve your career.
position2.context: To advance your career, you must proceed with both knowledge and intuition.

position3.upright: The unseen dynamics and behind-the-scenes processes are out of your control, the High Priestess says. There are things that remain secret.
position3.reversed: Reverse High Priestess, you cannot determine the timing of the revelation of uncertainties and secret information.
position3.context: It's not possible to know every fact in your career; Some things will remain hidden from you.

position4.upright: The High Priestess shows that she uses her intuition and wisdom in her work. Your inner strength is reflected in your performance.
position4.reversed: When the Reversed High Priestess suppresses your intuition, you may not be able to reveal your full potential.
position4.context: Your current effort gains value by bringing your wisdom and intuition to your work.

position5.upright: High Priestess, you can make positive changes in your career by listening to your intuition and paying attention to unseen opportunities.
position5.reversed: Reverse High Priestess, not suppressing your inner voice and trusting your intuition in your decisions will benefit your career.
position5.context: You should use your intuition more to make change in your career.

position6.upright: Mother Superior, intuitions or hidden truths that you ignored in the past may have hindered your career today.
position6.reversed: Reverse High Priestess, repressing your intuition may have led to poor choices in the past.
position6.context: The intuitions you suppressed in the past may have hindered your path today.

position7.upright: The High Priestess indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be shaped by inner wisdom and deep intuition.
position7.reversed: When the Reversed High Priestess suppresses your intuition, the result can be uncertainty and inner dissatisfaction.
position7.context: The outcome of your career journey will be taking conscious steps by guiding your intuition.

position1.upright: The Empress is a symbol of creativity and abundance. If your career gives you productivity, fulfillment, and the opportunity to demonstrate your values, you're on the right track.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Empress may indicate that your current job is dulling your creativity or does not value you. Maybe you chose this path to meet other people's expectations.
position1.context: Question whether you are experiencing your creative and productive side in your career.

position2.upright: The Empress recommends nurturing your creativity and increasing your productivity for growth. Creating new projects and expanding existing ideas strengthens your career.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Empress indicates that giving in to laziness or stifling your creativity will set you back.
position2.context: To develop your career, you must produce and grow creative projects.

position3.upright: The Empress shows that natural cycles and production processes require a certain amount of time. You cannot always control the pace of development.
position3.reversed: The Reverse Empress reminds you that the natural flow of inspiration or creativity develops outside of you.
position3.context: You can't control the time it takes for things to mature in your career.

position4.upright: The Empress shows that she brings creativity and productivity to her work. You're doing your best.
position4.reversed: Inverted Empress, when you restrict your productivity or stifle your inspiration, you are not using your full potential.
position4.context: Your current endeavor comes from bringing creativity to your work.

position5.upright: Empress, you can make positive changes in your career by nurturing your creativity and increasing your productivity.
position5.reversed: Reverse Empress, instead of neglecting yourself, you should focus on things that will stimulate your inspiration.
position5.context: To change your career, you need to reveal your creative side more.

position6.upright: The Empress may have hindered her career in the past by not being able to fully use her creativity or receive support.
position6.reversed: The Reversed Empress could be a lack of inspiration or blockage, an obstacle from the past.
position6.context: Lack of inspiration or support in the past affects your career today.

position7.upright: The Empress indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be full of creativity, productivity and abundance.
position7.reversed: The Reversed Empress can result in a lack of inspiration or restricted productivity.
position7.context: The result of your career journey will be to enter a creative and productive period.

position1.upright: Emperor means order, authority and solidity. If your current career offers you stability, security, and clarity, this path may be right.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Emperor tells you that you may be stuck in oppression and strict rules. Maybe you work in a place where you lose your freedom.
position1.context: You need to balance trust and freedom.

position2.upright: The Emperor recommends that you acquire discipline and regular study habits for improvement. Taking strategic steps and gaining authority will help you advance in your career.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Emperor indicates an inability to progress due to rigid rules or lack of planning. You must establish a balanced order.
position2.context: A solid structure and disciplined approach is required to develop your career.

position3.upright: The Emperor shows that authority figures and rules are not in your hands. The conditions of the institution or system you work in may be immutable facts.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Emperor, oppressive rulers or strict rules are factors you cannot control.
position3.context: Some rules and authority structures in your career will remain outside you.

position4.upright: The Emperor shows that discipline and determination are best reflected in his work. You're doing your best.
position4.reversed: Inverted Emperor, you may not be getting the full reward of your efforts due to too strict rules or lack of control.
position4.context: Your current effort is strengthened by discipline and order.

position5.upright: Emperor, you can make constructive changes in your work by strengthening discipline and order.
position5.reversed: The Reversed Emperor indicates that you need to abandon rigid rules and be more flexible.
position5.context: Flexibility along with discipline becomes important for change in your career.

position6.upright: Emperor, you may have been constrained by pressure from authority figures or strict rules in the past.
position6.reversed: Inverted Emperor, lack of discipline or lack of control may have created obstacles in the past.
position6.context: The problems you had with authority in the past may have hindered your current career.

position7.upright: The Emperor indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be shaped by stability, power and authority.
position7.reversed: The Reversed Emperor can be limiting, the result of rigid rules or excessive control.
position7.context: The result of your career journey will be to establish a solid structure and reach a strong position.

position1.upright: The saint represents traditional paths and safe spaces. If your current career provides you with structure and social acceptance, you may be in the right place.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Saint shows that he lives by other people's rules and loses the originality of his soul. Maybe this career doesn't align with your core values.
position1.context: Did you choose this path for social approval or for your own heart?

position2.upright: The saint recommends that you seek wisdom and guides for improvement. You may benefit from a teacher, mentor or training.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Saint shows that you should not be afraid to chart your own path. Sticking to traditional patterns can limit you.
position2.context: Follow the wisdom to advance your career, but create your own path.

position3.upright: Saint, the standards set by institutions, traditions, and authority figures are out of your control.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Saint shows that even if you question the rules, you cannot completely change society's expectations.
position3.context: In your career, some traditional structures remain beyond your control.

position4.upright: Aziz shows that he uses his knowledge and experience in his work. You have a strong ability to learn and teach.
position4.reversed: Reversed Saint, rejecting authority or not following rules can make effort seem lacking.
position4.context: Your current performance gets stronger by sharing your knowledge.

position5.upright: Aziz, you can improve your career by sharing your knowledge and getting support.
position5.reversed: Reversed Saint, you should learn to think innovatively instead of sticking to traditional patterns.
position5.context: For change in your career, you must be open to both learning and teaching.

position6.upright: Aziz, strictly adhering to traditional patterns may have limited you in the past.
position6.reversed: Reversed Saint, you may have lost support because of rejecting the rules of the past.
position6.context: Traditional pressures in the past may have created limits on his current career.

position7.upright: Aziz shows that the outcome of your career journey will be progressing on traditional methods, reliable support and solid foundations.
position7.reversed: Reversed Saint, rejection of rules or excessive rebellion can lead to unstable outcome.
position7.context: The result will be a journey strengthened by reliable supports and solid teachings.

position1.upright: It means lovers, choices and harmony. If your current career is compatible with your heart and mind, it is the right choice.
position1.reversed: Reversed Lovers say that the choice you make leads you into an internal conflict. Maybe you chose this path with the guidance of someone else.
position1.context: Question whether you followed your own heart in this career choice.

position2.upright: Lovers emphasize the importance of making the right choices in your career. If your heart and mind are in harmony, the steps you take will move you forward.
position2.reversed: Lovers Reversed indicates that indecision or wrong choices will make development difficult.
position2.context: To improve your career, make choices that align your heart and mind.

position3.upright: Lovers reminds you that you are not always in control of the dynamics of career collaborations and relationships.
position3.reversed: Reversed Lovers say that incompatibility or wrong choices can sometimes be caused by factors outside of you.
position3.context: You cannot determine all business relationships and harmony in your career.

position4.upright: Lovers show that you put your heart into your work and are sincere in your choices. You are doing your best.
position4.reversed: Reverse Lovers, you may not be able to fully transfer your energy due to indecision or inconsistency.
position4.context: Your effort is strengthened by your dedication to your work.

position5.upright: Lovers, you can make positive changes in your career by strengthening your work relationships and making sincere choices.
position5.reversed: Reverse Lovers, making clear choices instead of indecision increases your performance.
position5.context: It's important to make sincere choices for change in your career.

position6.upright: Lovers, wrong choices made in the past, or broken business relationships may have affected your path today.
position6.reversed: Lovers Reversed, incompatibility or uncertain choices may have created obstacles in your career.
position6.context: Past choices or incompatible relationships leave a mark on your career.

position7.upright: Lovers show that the outcome of the career journey will be shaped by harmonious choices and strong partnerships.
position7.reversed: Inverted Lovers, the journey may fall apart as a result of indecision or incompatible choices.
position7.context: The result will be career advancement with the right choices and harmonious partnerships.

position1.upright: The Chariot symbolizes will and determination. You have the motivation to move forward strongly in your current career.
position1.reversed: Inverted Chariot indicates that you are losing control or having trouble finding your bearings. Maybe this path isn't taking you forward.
position1.context: To advance in your career, you need to clarify your direction.

position2.upright: The Chariot recommends that you move forward with determination and focus. Setting a clear goal and taking strong steps towards it brings success in your career.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Chariot indicates that carelessness and disorganization are slowing you down.
position2.context: To improve your career, you need to set clear goals and focus.

position3.upright: The Chariot shows that external obstacles and circumstances can limit your speed. You can't always progress at the speed you want.
position3.reversed: Reverse Chariot, you may have to change direction due to obstacles you cannot control.
position3.context: Circumstances outside of you affect the speed at which you progress in your career.

position4.upright: The Chariot shows that perseverance and determination carry you forward. You are working with all your strength.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Chariot suggests that effort may dissipate due to lack of focus.
position4.context: Your current performance is revealed by transferring your willpower and focus to your work.

position5.upright: Chariot, you can make powerful changes in your career by focusing on the goal and increasing your determination.
position5.reversed: Reversed Chariot, you need to move forward with focus rather than scattered energy.
position5.context: You need to show more focus and willpower for change in your career.

position6.upright: Chariot, losing your bearings or lack of focus in the past may have made it difficult for you to progress today.
position6.reversed: Reversed Chariot, lack of willpower may have slowed you down in the past.
position6.context: Lack of control and focus in the past may have affected your career today.

position7.upright: The Chariot indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be victory through the power of will, determination and direction.
position7.reversed: Reversed Chariot, lack of control or disorganization may lead to delayed results.
position7.context: The result will be victory by strengthening your will.

position1.upright: Strength represents inner courage and patience. If this career gives you the opportunity to show your strength in a balanced way, you may be in the right place.
position1.reversed: Reverse Strength tells you that you lack self-confidence or feel under pressure. Maybe this career is wearing you out.
position1.context: Question whether you have demonstrated your strength in a balanced way in your career.

position2.upright: It recommends that you act with strength, patience, self-discipline and inner courage. In this way, you can overcome obstacles and make your development permanent.
position2.reversed: Reverse Strength indicates that you are holding back due to impatience or lack of self-confidence.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must be patient, balanced and take courageous steps.

position3.upright: Power tells you that even though you have inner patience, you cannot control the behavior of others or external pressures.
position3.reversed: Reversed Strength indicates that you have no control over the attitudes of others that test you.
position3.context: You can't change other people's attitudes in your career; You can only manage your own patience.

position4.upright: Strength shows that patience, self-control and inner resilience are best reflected in your work.
position4.reversed: Reversed Power, impatience, or insecurity can devalue the effort.
position4.context: You do your best with patience and self-control.

position5.upright: You can make positive changes in your work by increasing your strength, patience and self-discipline.
position5.reversed: Reversed Power, overcoming insecurities brings improvement in your career.
position5.context: You should use your inner power more for change in your career.

position6.upright: Power may have limited his career in the past due to impatience or lack of self-confidence.
position6.reversed: The Reverse Power is reflected in your efforts today when fears are holding you back.
position6.context: Past insecurities and fears affect your career today.

position7.upright: Power indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be success with patience, courage and inner balance.
position7.reversed: Opposite Power: succumbing to your fears can lead to poor results.
position7.context: The result will be to achieve success by using your inner strength with patience and courage.

position1.upright: The saint symbolizes the wisdom that comes with inner search and loneliness. Maybe your current career doesn't offer you inner satisfaction and you need to find your own path.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Saint shows that he is very introverted and distant from the outside world. Maybe this job makes you lonely.
position1.context: Turn to your inner guide to find what you are really looking for on your career path.

position2.upright: The saint recommends finding your own path through inner exploration and alone time. It will be important to listen to inner guidance for development.
position2.reversed: Reversed Saint, extreme loneliness or introversion can keep you from moving forward.
position2.context: To develop your career, you must first discover your own path.

position3.upright: Ermi≈ü shows that periods of being alone or withdrawn may arise as a need that you cannot control in the flow of life.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Saint tells us that sometimes forced loneliness or feeling isolated is out of your control.
position3.context: Being lonely at times in your career may be out of your control.

position4.upright: The saint shows that he approaches his work with deep thought and experience. Your effort meets wisdom.
position4.reversed: Inverted Saint, extreme introversion or loneliness may limit performance.
position4.context: Your effort emerges when you reflect your experiences and inner strength into your work.

position5.upright: Ermi≈ü, thinking alone and gaining new insights can lead to change in your career.
position5.reversed: Inverted Saint, opening up instead of staying too isolated brings development.
position5.context: For change in your career, you need to take time to think deeply.

position6.upright: Ermi≈ü, being too introverted or alone in the past may have slowed down his development.
position6.reversed: Reversed Saint, you may have missed opportunities due to isolation.
position6.context: Extreme loneliness or isolation in the past affects your career today.

position7.upright: The saint indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be wisdom, inner enlightenment and deep awareness.
position7.reversed: Reversed Hermit can be limiting as a result of isolation or excessive confinement.
position7.context: The result will be reaching a point of maturity with wisdom and inner discovery.

position1.upright: The Wheel of Destiny represents change and opportunity. Your current career path may be shaped by surprising developments.
position1.reversed: The inverted Wheel of Destiny indicates that you are stuck in cycles that you cannot control. Maybe this job keeps bringing you to the same place.
position1.context: Be aware of the cycle your career is taking you into.

position2.upright: The Wheel of Destiny tells you that you must seize opportunities by adapting to changes. Luck may come your way, you have to be open.
position2.reversed: The inverted Wheel of Destiny indicates that when you resist change, you may miss opportunities.
position2.context: To advance your career, you must flexibly adapt to change.

position3.upright: The Wheel of Destiny tells you that you are out of control of the cycles of luck and fate. Some ups and downs are inevitable.
position3.reversed: The inverted Wheel of Destiny reminds you that misfortunes and delays cannot always be prevented.
position3.context: Some changes in your career are the natural cycle of fate and are out of your control.

position4.upright: The Wheel of Destiny shows that you are doing your best when faced with opportunities. You evaluate the cycles well.
position4.reversed: The reversed Wheel of Destiny, bad luck or delays may prevent you from reflecting your full performance.

position1.upright: The Knight of Pentacles symbolizes discipline, patience and determination. You are progressing steadily in your career.
position1.reversed: The Knight of Pentacles reversed can indicate monotony or inflexibility.
position1.context: Your real career is the path where you will achieve success with your regular and disciplined progress.

position2.upright: The Knight of Pentacles advises you to proceed with patience and consistency. Working out regularly will make you stronger.
position2.reversed: The Knight of Pentacles reversed indicates that monotony or too much rigidity can slow down one's development.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must work patiently and regularly.

position3.upright: Knight of Pentacles, you can't always control the rhythm of your workload or the pace of your tasks.
position3.reversed: Knight of Pentacles reversed, monotony or slow progress is sometimes inevitable.
position3.context: You can't always set the pace in your career.

position4.upright: The Knight of Pentacles shows that he works steadily, patiently and methodically. You're doing your best.
position4.reversed: Knight of Pentacles reversed, excessive routine or inflexibility can reduce productivity.
position4.context: Effort culminates in regular rhythms and processes.

position5.upright: Knight of Pentacles, working with patience and consistency brings beneficial change in your career.
position5.reversed: Knight of Pentacles reversed, you should be flexible rather than stuck in routines.
position5.context: For change in your career, you must be open to innovation while maintaining stability.

position6.upright: For the Knight of Pentacles, moving too slowly or not taking risks may have hindered his career in the past.
position6.reversed: Knight of Pentacles reversed, monotony and lack of motivation may have limited you in the past.
position6.context: Moving too slowly in the past may have hindered your career today.

position7.upright: The Knight of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be patience, discipline and steady progress.
position7.reversed: The reversed Knight of Pentacles can complicate the process as a result of monotony or laziness.
position7.context: The result will be patient and disciplined progress.

position1.upright: The Queen of Pentacles symbolizes fertility, compassion and practicality. You can take on both a productive and supportive role in your career.
position1.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed may indicate excessive materialism or neglect of self-care.
position1.context: Your true career is the way you demonstrate both your productivity and your compassion.

position2.upright: The Queen of Pentacles recommends that you take an approach to development that is both productive and supportive.
position2.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed indicates that excessive materialism or neglecting self-care may strain you.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must highlight your productivity and practicality.

position3.upright: Queen of Pentacles, you cannot control the support or affection of the people around you.
position3.reversed: Reversed Queen of Pentacles, the materialistic attitudes of others may develop outside of you.
position3.context: You cannot change the approach of those around you in your career.

position4.upright: The Queen of Pentacles shows that you have a productive, practical and nurturing work style. You manage resources well.
position4.reversed: Reversed Queen of Pentacles, neglecting self-care can reduce the quality of your performance.
position4.context: √áaban is at his best with a balance of practical solutions and self-care.

position5.upright: The Queen of Pentacles produces practical solutions and manages her resources wisely, bringing beneficial change in her career.
position5.reversed: Reverse Queen of Pentacles, you should not neglect self-care and pursue balance.
position5.context: You should focus on practical solutions and balance for change in your career.

position6.upright: The Queen of Pentacles' inability to use her resources efficiently or produce practical solutions may have hindered her career in the past.
position6.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles Reversed, lack of self-care or disorganization may have set boundaries in the past.
position6.context: Not being able to manage resources well in the past may have hindered your current career.

position7.upright: The Queen of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be shaped by wise management of your resources, productivity and balance.
position7.reversed: Queen of Pentacles reversed, clutter or lack of self-care can negatively impact the outcome.
position7.context: The result will be empowerment with productivity and resource management.

position1.upright: The King of Pentacles symbolizes abundance, trust and leadership. You have achieved stability and success in your career.
position1.reversed: The reversed King of Pentacles may indicate that you are consumed by excessive control or material ambitions.
position1.context: Your real career is the path you build with leadership and abundance awareness.

position2.upright: The King of Pentacles advises you to act with leadership, abundance and confidence. Material and moral stability provides rise in your career.
position2.reversed: The King of Pentacles reversed indicates that excessive control or ambition can consume you.
position2.context: To advance your career, you must demonstrate confident and visionary leadership.

position3.upright: The King of Pentacles indicates that the economic system and the decisions of the leaders are outside of you.
position3.reversed: Reversed King of Pentacles, you cannot change the attitudes of overly controlling or oppressive leaders.
position3.context: You cannot determine the rules of the economic system in your career.

position4.upright: The King of Pentacles indicates a strategic, reliable and results-oriented performance. You're doing your best.
position4.reversed: Reversed King of Pentacles, excessive control or focusing solely on the outcome can undermine team performance.
position4.context: Efforts are multiplied by strategic wisdom and trust building.

position5.upright: The King of Pentacles, establishing a long-term strategy and being a reliable leader brings beneficial change in your career.
position5.reversed: Reversed King of Pentacles, you should make room for flexibility rather than excessive control.
position5.context: You must develop trustworthy and visionary leadership for change in your career.

position6.upright: King of Pentacles, being overly controlling or focusing too much on security may have hindered your career in the past.
position6.reversed: Reversed King of Pentacles, irresponsible financial decisions or a lack of vision may have limited you in the past.
position6.context: Lack of control or vision in the past may have hindered his career today.

position7.upright: The King of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be strong leadership, financial stability and visionary success.
position7.reversed: The reversed King of Pentacles can complicate the process as a result of excessive control or irresponsible financial decisions.
position7.context: The result will be success with strong and trustworthy leadership.

position2.upright: The Ace of Cups suggests opening your heart and emotionally embracing new opportunities for your growth. Adding inspiration and compassion to your career will move you forward.
position2.reversed: The Ace of Cups reversed indicates that suppressing your emotions or underestimating your inspiration will slow down your development.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must take inspiring steps that speak to your heart.

position3.upright: The Ace of Cups shows that emotional inspiration or opportunities from the heart are not always within your control. Inspiration comes whenever it arises.
position3.reversed: The Ace of Cups reversed reminds us that emotional blockages or disappointments cannot change the natural cycle.
position3.context: You cannot determine when emotional inspiration arises in your career.

position4.upright: The Ace of Cups shows that you proceed in your work with sincerity and sincerity. Your effort is very valuable because you put your heart into it.
position4.reversed: Ace of Cups Reversed: When you suppress your emotions or lose inspiration, your efforts may not seem complete.
position4.context: Your effort becomes strongest when you sincerely put your heart into your work.

position5.upright: Ace of Cups, adding more sincerity and emotional connection to your work will bring you new inspiration and motivation.
position5.reversed: Inverted Ace of Cups: Expressing your emotions instead of suppressing them creates positive change in your career.
position5.context: To change your career, you need to put more of your heart into your work.

position6.upright: Ace of Cups: Not being able to express your emotions freely or suppressing your inspiration in the past may have hindered your current career.
position6.reversed: Ace of Cups reversed, emotional closures and disappointments may be reducing your motivation today.
position6.context: Suppressing your emotions in the past is hindering your career today.

position7.upright: The Ace of Cups indicates that the outcome of your career journey will bring inspired new beginnings and satisfaction.
position7.reversed: Ace of Cups reversed, lack of emotional motivation can delay the outcome.
position7.context: The result will be an emotionally satisfying new era.

position1.upright: The Ace of Cups indicates that you are seeking emotional fulfillment in your career. The career you want should be a job that fills you up rather than just making money. Listen to your heart.
position1.reversed: The Ace of Cups reversed indicates feeling emotionally empty. Your current career doesn't make you happy inside. It's time to rediscover your passion.
position1.context: This card emphasizes the importance of emotional satisfaction in career choice. The career you really want should be felt with your heart, not just your logic.

position2.upright: The Two of Cups suggests that you move forward through cooperation and partnership. Working in harmony with reliable people will grow your career.
position2.reversed: The Two of Cups reversed indicates that incompatible partnerships can slow you down.
position2.context: To develop your career, you need to partner with the right people.

position3.upright: The Two of Cups tells you that the harmony of business partnerships and relationships is not entirely under your control. The attitude of the other person is decisive.
position3.reversed: The Two of Cups reversed indicates that discord and disagreements sometimes develop outside of you.
position3.context: You cannot always determine the balance in relationships in your career.

position4.upright: The Two of Cups shows that you are doing your best in cooperation and harmony. It contributes to the performance of partnerships.
position4.reversed: Inverted Two of Cups, lack of harmony or misunderstandings can prevent effort from appearing.
position4.context: Your effort is reflected in your work through the harmony you establish in your relationships.

position5.upright: Two of Cups, strengthening business relationships and being open to collaborations creates beneficial changes in your career.
position5.reversed: Reversed Two of Cups, resolving communication gaps is a critical step in your development.
position5.context: For change in your career, you need to make your business partnerships more compatible.

position6.upright: Two of Cups: Disruption or disharmony in business relationships in the past may have affected your current career.
position6.reversed: The Two of Cups Reversed may be complicating the path of disappointments or loss of trust in partnerships.
position6.context: Incompatible work relationships in the past may have hindered your current career.

position7.upright: Two Cups indicate that the outcome of the career journey will be strengthened by harmonious collaborations and mutual trust.
position7.reversed: Reversed Two of Cups, incompatible partnerships or lack of communication can affect the outcome.
position7.context: The result will be moving forward with harmonious business relationships.

position1.upright: The Two of Cups indicates that the career you want is based on cooperation and balanced relationships. Teamwork and harmonious environments make you happy.
position1.reversed: The inverted Two of Cups indicates discord in the current business environment. The career you want should offer a more balanced and supportive environment.
position1.context: This card reminds you how important human relationships and collaboration are in career happiness.

position2.upright: Three Cups recommends that you get support from those around you for development and share your successes. Celebrations and social connections can open new doors for you.
position2.reversed: The Three of Cups reversed indicates that neglecting your social circle can make you lonely.
position2.context: To advance your career, you should share your successes and strengthen your support network.

position3.upright: The Three of Cups tells you that the dynamics of communities and celebrations evolve outside of you. You can't always control the support environment around you.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Three of Cups indicates that disconnections or misunderstandings in your social circle are sometimes out of your control.
position3.context: You cannot control the support your social environment offers you in your career.

position4.upright: Three Cups shows that you contribute to team spirit in your work and share successes.
position4.reversed: Inverted Three of Cups, disharmony within the team can overshadow the value of the effort.
position4.context: Your effort shines through the support you bring to your teamwork.

position5.upright: Three of Cups, being more involved in teamwork and sharing successes provides career development.
position5.reversed: Reversed Three of Cups, you need to break away from isolation and connect more with communities.
position5.context: For change in your career, you must strengthen your social ties.

position6.upright: Three of Cups: Lack of support or poor social ties in the past may have slowed down your career.
position6.reversed: Inverted Three of Cups, isolation or lack of cooperation may be an obstacle from the past.
position6.context: Weak ties in the past affect your career.

position7.upright: The Three of Cups indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be shaped by supportive communities and achievements to celebrate.
position7.reversed: Inverted Three of Cups, loneliness or lack of support can slow the outcome.
position7.context: The result will be a success that brings support and celebration.

position1.upright: The Three of Cups indicates that the career you want will bring social interaction and a sense of community. Team spirit and celebrations motivate you.
position1.reversed: The inverted Three of Cups indicates unhappiness working alone or social isolation. The career you want should offer more social connections.
position1.context: This card emphasizes the importance of the social dimension and shared achievements in career satisfaction.

position2.upright: The Four of Cups suggests you see opportunities that you were not aware of. You should not underestimate the offers you encounter for your development.
position2.reversed: The inverted Four of Cups tells you that it is time to gain awareness and seize new opportunities.
position2.context: To advance your career, you must open your mind and seize opportunities.

position3.upright: The Four of Cups shows that you cannot control when opportunities present themselves. Sometimes options depend on external circumstances.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Four of Cups tells you that you must wait for the right moment for awareness to open; This timing is out of your hands.
position3.context: Some opportunities in your career become visible only when the time comes.

position4.upright: The Four of Cups shows that sometimes you can feel dissatisfied even if you try your best. Your effort is strong but you may lack motivation.
position4.reversed: When the Reversed Four of Cups is not focused on opportunities, the visibility of its performance decreases.
position4.context: You have the effort, but you may need to focus more on opportunities.

position5.upright: The Four of Cups indicates that you need to be more open to new opportunities. Instead of focusing too much on the current situation, you should look at your surroundings.
position5.reversed: Inverted Four of Cups, you can create a powerful change in your performance by increasing your awareness.
position5.context: You need to be more careful and open to change in your career.

position6.upright: Four Cups, failure to recognize opportunities in the past may have limited his path today.
position6.reversed: Inverted Four of Cups, apathy or lack of motivation in the past may have affected the present.
position6.context: Opportunities that you ignored in the past are blocking your path today.

position7.upright: The Four of Cups indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be to seek inner fulfillment.
position7.reversed: Reversed Four of Cups may cause you to realize opportunities late as a result of lack of awareness.
position7.context: The result will be based on inner satisfaction and awareness.

position1.upright: The Four of Cups indicates that you are ignoring available opportunities. The career you want may already be in front of you, but dissatisfaction has blinded you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Four of Cups indicates that you are finally waking up and starting to see the opportunities around you. A new perspective can help you find the career you want.
position1.context: This card reminds us that in our career search, sometimes the problem is not outside, but in our perspective.

position2.upright: The Five of Cups suggests that you learn from past losses and move on. You should focus on the opportunities that lie ahead for development.
position2.reversed: The reversed Five of Cups tells you that you should stop dwelling on the past and move on to new possibilities.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must let go of past disappointments.

position3.upright: The Five of Cups shows that some losses and disappointments cannot be changed. The influence of the past is out of your control.
position3.reversed: The reversed Five of Cups reminds you that the timing of the opportunities that follow losses is outside of you.
position3.context: Some disappointments are inevitable in your career; you can't change them.

position4.upright: Five Cups shows that he did his best despite past losses. Your effort continues despite the difficulties.
position4.reversed: Your performance will be strengthened when the Reversed Five of Cups turns your focus away from losses.
position4.context: Your effort stands out by continuing even in difficult times.

position5.upright: Five of Cups, you can improve by learning from past losses and turning your focus to the opportunities ahead.
position5.reversed: Reversed Five of Cups, letting go of regrets makes it easier to move forward in your career.
position5.context: For change in your career, you should turn your focus to opportunities, not losses.

position6.upright: Five of Cups, focusing too much on past losses may have made it difficult for you to progress in your career.
position6.reversed: Inverted Five of Cups, not being able to let go of regrets may be an obstacle that carries you to this day.
position6.context: Dwelling on past losses affects your career today.

position7.upright: The Five of Cups indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be to learn from losses and become stronger.
position7.reversed: Reversed Five of Cups, dwelling on the past can delay the outcome.
position7.context: The result will be a stronger future with lessons learned from losses.

position1.upright: The Five of Cups indicates a focus on past career disappointments. Look not at what you've lost, but at the opportunities you still have. The career you want is still possible.
position1.reversed: The reversed Five of Cups indicates leaving the past behind and focusing on the future. Old disappointments no longer hold you back. It's time to make a new start.
position1.context: This card emphasizes that past failures should not define us in our career journey, and the importance of looking forward.

position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is full of childlike curiosity and excitement about life. He has an adventurous spirit, open to new beginnings, but this can sometimes cause him to be unplanned and unscheduled. He approaches relationships with this free spirit.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Fool indicates that this person may be reckless, irresponsible, or afraid to start a relationship. He or she may be ignoring potential dangers and avoiding attachment.
position1.context: This person is an adventurer who is ready or afraid to turn a new page in his love life.

position2.upright: There is a childlike curiosity and desire to experiment in your physical connection. It has the potential for spontaneous, fun and unplanned sexual exploration. A free adventure, away from rules and expectations.
position2.reversed: Reverse Fool indicates that there may be recklessness, thoughtlessness or risky behavior in sexual matters. One party may be holding back due to inexperience or fear of commitment.
position2.context: The sensual attraction between you marks the beginning of a new and exciting sexual adventure.

position3.upright: You are at the beginning of a new journey emotionally and spiritually. This bond develops with an unexpected, pure and adventurous spirit. You are completely open and non-judgmental with each other.
position3.reversed: The Inverted Fool indicates that you are afraid of becoming emotionally attached or are inconsiderate about making a spiritual connection. You are avoiding the seriousness of this connection.
position3.context: Your emotional bond, the joyful and unpredictable journey of two souls jumping into the unknown.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will take you on a completely new and unexpected path. This may not be a traditional relationship, but it has the potential to start a new life together. An uncertain but exciting future.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Fool indicates that in the long run, this relationship will remain in the air due to irresponsibility or fear of commitment. A potential beginning may end before it happens.
position4.context: The long-term fate of this relationship is a bold step into the unknown.

position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is someone who is attractive, talented, and has the power to get what he wants. He has high communication skills and knows how to turn events to his advantage. He may be creating a conscious attraction towards you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Magician indicates that this person may be manipulative, deceptive, or someone who does not use their potential. His words and actions may not be consistent or he may lack self-confidence.
position1.context: This person is a creator who sits in the director's chair of his life and relationships.

position2.upright: There is a strong and conscious sexual attraction between you. One or both parties know what they want and are quite skilled in bed. The potential for a creative and satisfying sexual life is high.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Magician indicates that sexual energy may be used for manipulation or deception. There may be performance anxiety or inability to use sexual potential.
position2.context: Your sexual connection is like a creative playground where desire and skill come together.

position3.upright: There is a strong will and conscious energy of creation among you. You know what you want emotionally and spiritually and you actively shape that connection. A powerful mental and spiritual synchronization.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Magician indicates that the emotional bond between you is being manipulated by one party or your spiritual potential is not being used. There may be emotional power plays.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a space where two strong wills create a world together.

position4.upright: In the long run, you have the power to create the relationship and life you want together. This will be a dynamic and strong union built with conscious effort.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Magician indicates that in the long run, potential will be wasted or the relationship will end as one party manipulates the other. Imbalance of power leads to destruction.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is a masterpiece full of potential that will be shaped by your will.

position1.upright: This person is mysterious, intuitive and does not show his emotions immediately. His inner world is rich and may take time to understand. He may be keeping his feelings for you a secret.
position1.reversed: The reversed High Priestess indicates that this person may be secretive, out of touch with their intuition, or insincere with you. He may have difficulty connecting with his inner world or with you.
position1.context: This person is a mysterious soul who experiences his emotions deep down, not on the surface.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is mysterious, intuitive, and holds potential that has not yet been fully unlocked. Rather than physical union, a spiritual attraction and unspoken desires are at the forefront. Sexuality is waiting to be explored slowly and deeply.
position2.reversed: The reversed High Priestess indicates repressed emotions, secrets, or a coldness in sexual matters. The parties are not sexually open to each other and an intuitive connection cannot be established.
position2.context: The sexual attraction between you is deep and mysterious, like invisible currents beneath the surface of water.

position3.upright: There is a spiritual connection between you that is deep and intuitive, beyond words. You understand each other's thoughts and feelings without speaking. This bond is mysterious and deep.
position3.reversed: The reversed High Priestess indicates that there are secrets being kept or an emotional distance between you. You are intuitively closed to each other and spiritually insecure.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is a quiet and deep whisper that only hearts can understand.

position4.upright: The long-term outcome of this relationship remains a mystery. It will take time for everything to become clear. The bond between you may continue on a deeper and more spiritual level than what appears on the surface.
position4.reversed: The reversed High Priestess indicates that in the long run, kept secrets or mistrust will destroy the relationship. You may never fully open up to each other.
position4.context: The ultimate fate of this relationship will be revealed in time, like a secret yet to be revealed.

position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is someone who is nurturing, compassionate, warm-hearted, and loves the joys of life. It spreads beauty and abundance to its surroundings. He or she may have a trusting, maternal or paternal attitude in relationships.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Empress indicates that this person may be overly possessive, lazy, or not taking care of themselves. They may have blocks in expressing creativity or love.
position1.context: This person is a heart full of life, nourishing with love and compassion.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is extremely sensual, nurturing, productive and sensual. Sexuality is experienced as a celebration of pleasure and abundance. There is fertility and a comfortable, natural sensual harmony.
position2.reversed: Reverse Empress indicates that there may be a laziness in sexual energy, a lack of self-care, or an inability to experience pleasure. There may be a lack of creativity or a possessive attitude in the physical connection.
position2.context: Your sexual life is like a fertile and pleasure-filled garden where all the senses are stimulated.

position3.upright: Your emotional connection is extremely nurturing, compassionate and warm. You lift each other's spirits and make each other feel emotionally safe. This is a fertile soil where love and compassion flourish.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Empress indicates emotionally stifling love, excessive possessiveness, or a relationship where emotional needs are not met. Spiritual development may have stopped.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is like a fertile mother's embrace that nourishes and nurtures each other with love.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a fruitful, loving and growing union. This carries the potential for marriage, having children, or building a highly creative and productive life together.
position4.reversed: Reverse Empress indicates that in the long run, the relationship will become stagnant, one party will become overly dependent on the other, or love will become stifling.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a fertile garden watered with love and constantly bearing fruit.

position1.upright: This person is organized, disciplined, protective and has a leadership spirit. He looks for stability and control in his life. It can offer a reliable shoulder and a solid foundation in relationships.
position1.reversed: Inverted Emperor indicates that this person may be overly controlling, rigid, dominant, or have problems with authority. He may have difficulty showing his emotions.
position1.context: This person is a leader who wants to build his life and relationships on solid foundations.

position2.upright: There is structure, control, and passion in your physical connection. An experienced energy that holds leadership and control in sexuality prevails. It can be a powerful and protective sexual dynamic.
position2.reversed: Inverted Emperor indicates an overly controlling, dominant or rigid attitude in sexual life. There may be a lack of emotional expression or lack of sexual desire. A power struggle may occur.
position2.context: Your sexual connection is a well-founded structure where passion and control merge.

position3.upright: Your emotional bond is built on solid foundations, stability and mutual respect. You are protective and loyal to each other. This is a trusting, structured spiritual partnership.
position3.reversed: The reversed Emperor indicates that there is emotional rigidity, battles for control, or a lack of affection between you. Emotions are not expressed, the spiritual bond remains weak.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a castle built strong enough to withstand storms.

position4.upright: The long-term result is an extremely stable, secure and lasting relationship. This indicates establishing solid structures such as marriage or a long-term partnership.
position4.reversed: Inverted Emperor indicates that in the long run, the relationship will become a prison due to battles for control, emotional rigidity, or dominance of one partner.
position4.context: The long-term destiny of this relationship is to build a solid empire that will stand the test of time.

position1.upright: The person you are interested in is someone who adheres to traditions, has high moral values ‚Äã‚Äãand attaches importance to social rules. He may seek seriousness, commitment and a traditional path in relationships.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Hierophant indicates that this person may be rule-breaking, rebellious, dogmatic, or narrow-minded. He may be feeling social pressure or rejecting traditional ways.
position1.context: This person is someone who lives love and life with a certain belief or value system.

position2.upright: Your physical connection can be experienced within the framework of traditional and certain expectations. Sexuality may be seen as part of a sacred bond or marriage. It carries the meaning of ritual and devotion rather than passion.
position2.reversed: The Hierophant reversed indicates a rebellion against sexual taboos or traditional morality. There may be a search for sexual freedom or unconventional sexual experiences.
position2.context: Your sexual life is lived within a framework shaped by social or personal beliefs.

position3.upright: There is a spiritual bond between you that is based on common beliefs, values ‚Äã‚Äãand traditions. This relationship has a higher meaning for you and you are spiritual teachers to each other.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Hierophant indicates that you are experiencing a conflict on spiritual or moral issues. Your values ‚Äã‚Äãdo not align and this causes emotional distance.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is like the companionship of two disciples united in a common belief system.

position4.upright: The long-term outcome of this relationship is a traditional commitment, usually marriage. A respectful partnership based on common beliefs and social values ‚Äã‚Äãawaits you.

position4.context: The ultimate destiny of this bond is a formal union, sanctified by society and tradition.

position1.upright: This person is at an important juncture regarding relationships and partnerships. Someone who acts from the heart, is loving, and is open to creating a deep connection with a partner. He may feel a strong spiritual attraction to you.
position1.reversed: Lovers Reversed indicates that this person is indecisive in relationships, making the wrong choices, or in conflict between their heart and mind. There may be incompatibility and communication problems.
position1.context: This person is someone who is searching for the path to his heart and is on the eve of an important relationship decision.

position2.upright: There is deep harmony and perfect chemistry between you, spiritually and physically. Sexuality is not just a physical act, it is the union of two souls. A sexual connection full of intense love and passion.
position2.reversed: Lovers reversed indicates physical and emotional disharmony, wrong decisions in sexual matters, or a disconnection. Even if the skin matches, it may indicate that the hearts are not on the same frequency.
position2.context: Your physical connection represents a sacred union, where two souls become one.

position3.upright: There is a deep spiritual and emotional harmony between you. This represents a soulmate or twin flame connection, the perfect union of hearts and minds. You complete each other emotionally.
position3.reversed: Reversed Lovers indicate that there is an emotional disharmony or spiritual disconnection between you. Your values ‚Äã‚Äãor hearts may be looking in different directions. A wrong emotional choice.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a sacred union where two souls come together to form a single whole.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a partnership full of deep love, spiritual unity and harmony. This is the highest potential of the ‚Äúsoulmate‚Äù connection and indicates lasting happiness.
position4.reversed: Lovers Reversed indicates that a wrong choice has been made in the long run and the relationship will end due to incompatibility. Separation of hearts is inevitable.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is a deep and meaningful love story where two souls become one.

position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is ambitious, strong-willed, and focused on their goals. He has taken control of his life and is moving forward quickly. If he wants a relationship, he will pursue this goal with determination.

position1.context: This person is a warrior who drives the car of his life with determination towards his goals.

position2.reversed: Inverted Chariot indicates an uncontrolled or aggressive use of sexual energy. There may be sexual disharmony, impatience or libido imbalance.
position2.context: Your sexual energy is a powerful and passionate force that moves towards its goal with determination.

position3.upright: You are emotionally fixated on the same target. The spiritual bond between you allows you to move towards a common goal. This is a strong team spirit that overcomes difficulties together.
position3.reversed: Inverted Chariot indicates that your emotional goals are going in different directions or there is a power struggle between you. You cannot progress on the same path spiritually.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a strong and determined chariot, traveling together towards the same goal.

position4.upright: You will achieve your goals by overcoming difficulties together. The long-term result is a victory won by a common will and a successful union.
position4.reversed: Reversed Chariot indicates that the relationship will derail in the long run due to power struggles and differing goals. Loss of control and failure.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a shared victory over adversity.

position1.upright: This person has inner strength, courage and patience. Overcomes difficulties with compassion and understanding rather than brute force. He is a gentle but strong character who can control his wild impulses.
position1.reversed: Reverse Strength indicates that this person is insecure, cowardly, or driven by inner impulses. He may be using his power incorrectly or feeling weak.
position1.context: This person is a brave heart who knows that true strength lies in kindness and patience.

position2.upright: Passion and affection are in perfect balance in your physical connection. Wild desires are managed with a gentle touch and patience. A sexuality that is strong but at the same time soft and loving.
position2.reversed: Inverted Strength indicates sexual insecurity or an uncontrolled expression of raw desires. There is no balance between passion and compassion.
position2.context: Your sexuality is an expression of an inner power that can tenderly tame a wild lion.

position3.upright: Your emotional bond is built on compassion, patience, and deep inner strength. You lovingly accept and calm even each other's wildest aspects. It's a bond that heals the soul.
position3.reversed: Reverse Strength indicates that you show emotional distrust or weakness towards each other. You may be draining each other's spiritual strength.
position3.context: Your emotional connection is a healing touch that tames even the most difficult emotions with compassion.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a deep, durable bond strengthened by compassion and patience. By accepting each other's even the most difficult aspects with love, you will establish an unshakable unity.

position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is someone who is introverted, on a spiritual quest, and in need of solitude. He may be distant from relationships at the moment and looking for his own inner guidance.
position1.reversed: The Inverted Hermit indicates that this person has forcibly isolated himself from society, suffers from a fear of loneliness, or refuses to listen to the advice of others. He may have been lost in isolation.

position2.reversed: The Inverted Hermit may indicate the end of a period of sexual isolation or having sexual intercourse out of fear of loneliness. There is an effort to connect, but it can be challenging.
position2.context: Physical connection is now secondary to a soul that is on a quest and turned inward.

position3.upright: There is an emotional distance between you or a period where both parties turn inward. Your connection may be based on respecting each other's spiritual journey. A deep but silent bond.

position1.upright: This person is at an important turning point and cycle of change in his life. The winds of fate blow for him. There may also be sudden and unexpected developments in your relationship life.

position1.upright: This person is in a period of pause to gain a different perspective on things. He may be making a sacrifice or waiting on something. He prefers to observe rather than take action now.

position1.upright: This person is in an important period of reckoning and rebirth in his life. He evaluates the past, forgives himself, and awakens to a higher purpose. There may be a second chance or an important decision in relationships.

position1.upright: This person has successfully completed a cycle in his life and achieved wholeness. He is at peace with himself, satisfied and ready to move on to a new phase. He also looks for a feeling of completion and satisfaction in relationships.

position1.upright: This person is emotionally ready for a new beginning. His heart is completely open to love, compassion and a new relationship. He may be starting to have pure and intense feelings for you.

position1.upright: This person feels a strong mutual attraction and emotional connection with you. Seeking a partnership, soulmate connection or deep understanding. Equivalence and harmony in the relationship are very important to him.
