position1.upright: This person can be strategic, cunning, and sometimes secretive. He may be avoiding responsibility, hiding something, or being dishonest. He may not be completely open with you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Swords indicates that this person's lie has been exposed, he is feeling remorse, or he no longer wants to do secret things. He may decide to be honest.
position1.context: This person is a cunning strategist who tries to implement his own plan without anyone noticing.

position2.upright: There is secrecy, deception or dishonest behavior in sexual life. It could be a fling, a secret affair, or sexual fantasies hidden from the partner.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Swords indicates the danger of a lie or deception being revealed. The guilt of keeping a secret or the fear of being caught.
position2.context: Your physical connection looks more like a clandestine plan than an honest union.

position3.upright: There may be a lack of honesty, kept secrets, or deception in your emotional connection. One party is not completely open to the other, which undermines spiritual trust.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Swords indicates the danger of a lie or secret being revealed or the remorse it brings. A need for spiritual cleansing.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is like an incomplete puzzle where one side is hiding something from the other.

position4.upright: The long-term result is cheating, lack of honesty, or one party secretly leaving the relationship. Lack of trust will bring the end of this bond.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Swords indicates that the relationship will end suddenly and painfully when a lie is revealed in the long run. Confrontation is inevitable.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is an end that comes when trust is betrayed.

position1.upright: This person feels trapped, restricted, and helpless. However, this situation is usually a self-created mental prison. He may not be aware of his own power and is playing the victim role.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Swords indicates that this person has broken free of self-limiting beliefs, become free, and has taken his or her own power. He found a way out of his mental prison.
position1.context: This person is a prisoner of his own thoughts and does not realize that the swords around him do not actually touch him.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is restricted by fears and mental barriers. One or both parties are afraid to express themselves sexually and feel trapped. Sexuality is experienced in a mental prison.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Swords indicates the overcoming of sexual taboos and fears. Mental barriers are removed and sexual liberation begins. Getting rid of self-limiting thoughts.
position2.context: The physical bond between you is struggling with the obstacles created by the person in his own mind.

position3.upright: You feel emotionally trapped. This bond seems to restrict your freedom, but it is often a mental prison of your own creation. You cannot progress spiritually.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Swords indicates that you are recognizing the emotional or spiritual obstacles that limit you and starting to get rid of them. A moment of liberation.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is a cage that you have built with your own fears, imprisoning you.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will turn into a situation that makes you feel trapped and helpless. You may not be able to break free from this bond due to your fears and limitations.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Swords indicates that you will find a way to break free from this restrictive relationship in the long run. This is a separation that will result in liberation.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a prison built with the fears you created.

position1.upright: This person is experiencing deep anxiety, fear, guilt, or nightmares. His mind may be tormenting him and he may be having sleepless nights. He is experiencing intense stress and anxiety.
position1.reversed: The Nine of Swords reversed indicates that this person has confronted their worst fears, realized that their concerns were unfounded, or has come to the end of a crisis. Healing and relief begins.
position1.context: This person is an anxious soul who gets lost in the dark corridors of his mind at night.

position2.upright: Sexual life is filled with anxiety, guilt or fear. Sexual performance anxiety, a past trauma, or shame can make physical intimacy a torment.
position2.reversed: The reversed Nine of Swords indicates that sexual fears have been confronted and these concerns are realized to be unfounded. A healing process is beginning, but there is still vulnerability.
position2.context: Your sex life is like a dark night filled with anxiety that turns into mental torture.

position3.upright: This emotional attachment gives you anxiety, guilt, or fear. Mental concerns about the relationship drain you spiritually. You may be cruel to each other or to yourself.
position3.reversed: The Nine of Swords reversed indicates that you are facing your worst fears and realizing that they are unfounded. The end of an emotional crisis and a spiritual relief.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a nightmare full of anxiety and fear that keeps you up at night.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a relationship full of anxiety, guilt and fear. This bond will bring you more mental pain than happiness and will turn into a nightmare.
position4.reversed: The reversed Nine of Swords indicates that in the long run, a crisis or great fear will end the relationship. Worries may become reality.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a sleepless night full of worries and regrets.

position1.upright: This person has experienced a painful end, a betrayal, or a breakdown. He's at his lowest point and thinks it's all over. But this also heralds a new beginning, because it can't get any worse.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Ten of Swords indicates that this person has narrowly escaped a disaster, the healing process has begun, or the pain of the past still lingers. There may not have been a complete ending.
position1.context: This person has been stabbed in the back and has reached rock bottom, but is now ready for rebirth.

position2.upright: A sexual ending, the most painful point of a betrayal, or a complete depletion of sexual energy. This is the end of an era and there is no other way but a new beginning.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Ten of Swords indicates gradual recovery after a painful sexual situation. The wounds are still fresh, but the worst may be over. Avoiding a complete collapse.
position2.context: Your physical connection represents a painful end that has reached its lowest point.

position3.upright: This represents the most painful point of an emotional ending or a betrayal. You feel at the bottom spiritually. But this ending is a beginning for a new, healthier bond.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Ten of Swords indicates gradual recovery after a painful emotional situation. The wounds are still fresh, but a spiritual healing process has begun.
position3.context: Your emotional connection is a painful ending that feels like a stab in the back.

position4.upright: The long-term consequence is a painful and certain end. This relationship will end with a betrayal or an inevitable collapse. This ending is also a necessity for a new beginning.
position4.reversed: The reversed Ten of Swords indicates that a painful ending is constantly being postponed or that the pain will continue for a long time even after a breakup. It never ends completely.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is to end in an inevitable and painful finale.

position1.upright: This person is curious, energetic, talkative and sometimes a gossip. He is eager to learn new things but can be impatient. He or she may approach you with a sharp intelligence and a questioning attitude.
position1.reversed: The Reverse Servant of Swords indicates that this person may be hurtful with their words, be defensive, or talk nonsense. There may be problems and misunderstandings in communication.
position1.context: This person is a young and energetic mind, eager to explore ideas and facts with the sword in his hand.

position2.upright: A curious, inquisitive and talkative energy on sexual matters. Potential for 'dirty talk' or communicating openly about sexual experiences. A little inexperienced but enthusiastic.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Man of Swords indicates that words can be hurtful in sexual life or lies. Communication can distance rather than bring closer. A defensive sexuality.
position2.context: Your physical connection is a keen and curious game played with words and the mind.

position3.upright: The emotional bond between you is nourished by intellectual curiosity and open communication. You enjoy exploring each other's minds. However, this can sometimes lack emotional depth.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Servant of Swords indicates that there are hurtful words, arguments, or mental games between you. Communication damages the spiritual bond rather than strengthening it.
position3.context: Your emotional connection is a sharp and curious mind game played with words and ideas.

position4.upright: The future of this relationship will be one of constant questioning and communication. This can be mentally stimulating, but can also lead to constant arguments and disagreements.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Man of Swords indicates that in the long run, hurtful words and dishonest communication will destroy the relationship. You will be impatient with each other.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a never-ending negotiation and mental chess game.

position1.upright: This person is ambitious, focused, quick-thinking and even faster-moving. He is focused on a goal and is moving quickly to achieve it. He can be thoughtless and hasty at times.
position1.reversed: The Knight of Swords reversed indicates that this person may be aggressive, reckless, quarrelsome, or deviant from their goals. He is using his energy in the wrong direction.
position1.context: This person is an unstoppable warrior of ideas who moves towards his goal like a storm.

position2.upright: A fast, passionate and perhaps a little impulsive sexual approach. It can carry a 'one night stand' energy. It is goal-oriented and focuses on action and conquest rather than emotional depth.
position2.reversed: The reversed Knight of Swords may indicate an aggressive, rude or selfish sexual partner. Hasty energy that ignores the needs of its partner.
position2.context: Your sexual energy is a goal-oriented raider that comes and goes like a storm.

position3.upright: Your emotional connection is quick, direct, and sometimes impulsive. You don't mind telling the truth, but it may lack compassion. A rapid but staggering spiritual progress.
position3.reversed: The Knight of Swords reversed indicates aggressive arguments and emotional aggression between you. You are wounding each other's souls.
position3.context: Your emotional attachment is a swift storm that destroys everything in its path in its search for truth.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a sudden and rapid separation. One party may decide to end the relationship without thinking and quickly.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Knight of Swords indicates a breakup followed by a major and devastating fight over the long term. Irreversible words may be said.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is an end that comes suddenly like a storm and destroys everything.

position1.upright: This person is intelligent, independent, honest and humorous. He acts with his logic, not his emotions. He may have learned from bitter experiences. Expects clarity and honesty in relationships.
position1.reversed: The Queen of Swords reversed indicates that this person may be overly critical, cold, vindictive, or cruel. He can use his intelligence to injure others.
position1.context: This person is a sharp-witted, independent spirit who allows you to see the truth.

position2.upright: It represents someone who is sexually intelligent, experienced and knows what they want. He emphasizes open communication and mental harmony rather than emotional drama. He can be witty and have a sharp sexual intelligence.
position2.reversed: The Queen of Swords reversed may indicate someone who is sexually cold, distant, critical, or has shut down because of past hurts. He may use sexuality as a means of revenge.
position2.context: Your sexuality is an area guided by intelligence and experience, where emotional distance is maintained.

position3.upright: The emotional bond between you is built on honesty, intelligence and independence. You are clear and open with each other. This is a mature spiritual understanding formed after painful experiences.
position3.reversed: The Queen of Swords reversed indicates that there is emotional coldness, distance or harsh criticism between you. The wounds of the past have frozen the spiritual bond.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is intelligent and clear understanding, free of emotional drama.

position4.upright: The long-term outcome is a clear and logical decision to part ways. This can be an unsentimental but honest ending that comes after bitter experiences. Independence is gained.
position4.reversed: The Queen of Swords reversed indicates that in the long run, coldness, distance and unforgiveness will destroy the relationship. A lonely and vengeful ending.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a sharp and clear decision, free of emotions.

position1.upright: This person is an intellectual, authoritarian, fair and analytical leader. Makes decisions based on facts and logic. He may be emotionally distant, but he is a fair and honest partner.
position1.reversed: The Reversed King of Swords indicates that this person may be judgmental, manipulative, insensitive, or someone who abuses their power. He can be an intellectual bully.
position1.context: This person is a wise and impartial mind who reigns in the kingdom of reason and justice.

position2.upright: It represents someone with authority, intelligence and control in sexuality. Sexual fantasies or conversations may occur on an intellectual level. An emotionally distant but fair and honest sexual partner.
position2.reversed: The Reversed King of Swords indicates someone who is sexually manipulative, controlling, and callous. He may use his intelligence to control or sexually dominate his partner.
position2.context: Your sexual connection is a highly controlled space where intelligence and logic reign.

position3.upright: The spiritual bond between you is based on high mental harmony, justice and honesty. You respect each other intellectually. This is a wise and mature partnership of minds.
position3.reversed: The Reversed King of Swords indicates a bond that is emotionally manipulative, cold and judgmental. Intelligence is used to establish superiority rather than establishing a spiritual bond.
position3.context: Your emotional connection is a mature realm of mind where truth and justice reign.

position4.upright: The long-term result is an intellectual partnership or a fair and reasonable separation. A decision will be reached based on facts and logic, rather than emotions.
position4.reversed: The Reverse King of Swords indicates that the relationship will end in the long run due to mental superiority or manipulation by one party over the other. A cold and unfair ending.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is determined by a final and fair decision, like that of a judge.

position1.upright: This person is on the verge of a new beginning full of energy, inspiration and passion. High creative potential and ready to take action. He may feel intense physical attraction and excitement towards you.
position1.reversed: The Ace of Wands reversed indicates that this person is having trouble making a start, is uninspired, or has low energy. It may have encountered a delay or obstacle.
position1.context: This person carries within him an explosive spark of creativity and passion.

position2.upright: There is a new and powerful sexual spark between you. This is the beginning of great passion, physical energy and sexual awakening. There is an irresistible desire.
position2.reversed: The Ace of Wands reversed indicates a lack of sexual desire, low energy, or a waning attraction between you. There's potential, but it just never ignites. Impotence or frigidity.
position2.context: Your physical connection holds the first spark of passion ready to explode.

position3.upright: There is a new and exciting spiritual spark between you. This bond inspires you and makes you want to create together. A passionate spiritual beginning.
position3.reversed: The Ace of Wands Reversed indicates low spiritual and emotional energy between you or a reluctance to make a start. Inspiration is blocked.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection, that exciting spark at the beginning of a new project or adventure.

position4.upright: The long-term result is embarking on a new and passionate adventure together. This heralds a new beginning, a joint project, or an energetic union.
position4.reversed: The Ace of Wands reversed indicates that a potential will not be realized in the long run and the passion will fade. Everything ends before a beginning can be made.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a bright spark of passion that ignites a new life.

position1.upright: This person is someone who makes plans for his future, weighs his potential, and is ready to explore the world. He wants more than his current situation. He may also be planning the next step in relationships.
position1.reversed: The Two of Wands reversed indicates that this person is afraid of the future, avoids making plans, or underestimates his or her potential. He may be afraid of taking risks.
position1.context: This person is a visionary with the world in hand, planning his next move.

position2.upright: You desire each other physically and think about future sexual potential. A discovery and planning phase. There is a desire to go further sexually.
position2.reversed: The Two of Wands reversed means fear of taking a sexual step, not taking risks, or the attraction remaining one-sided. There is desire but no action.
position2.context: Your physical energy is like an explorer full of potential, thinking about taking the next step.

position3.upright: You create a shared spiritual vision and future plan. This bond encourages you to grow individually and together. You believe in each other's potential.
position3.reversed: The Two of Wands Reversed indicates a lack of shared vision or indecision about future plans. Spiritually, you look in different directions.
position3.context: Your emotional connection is two explorers looking towards a shared future and planning the next step.

position4.upright: The long-term outcome is making bold plans together and moving forward into the future. This can be a successful partnership driven by a shared vision.
position4.reversed: The Two of Wands inverted indicates that the relationship will not go anywhere in the long run due to indecision or fear of the future. Potential cannot be put into action.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is to conquer the world with a common vision.

position1.upright: This person has started to reap the first fruits of his plans and looks to the future with hope. They have broad horizons and long-term goals. He is optimistic and expectant about the future of the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Three of Wands reversed indicates that this person is experiencing delays or obstacles in their plans, is unable to move forward, or is frustrated. There may be impatience and lack of foresight.
position1.context: This person is an explorer who is waiting for his ships to return to port and looking to the future with hope.

position2.upright: Your sexual expectations and desires are met. A period of physical opening and discovery. If you are in a long distance relationship, it may indicate that the time for reunion is approaching.
position2.reversed: The Three of Wands reversed indicates disappointment, delays or dissatisfaction in sexual life. Your expectations are not realized. Impatience prevents pleasure.
position2.context: Your physical connection is a place of anticipation, with new and exciting sexual adventures on the horizon.

position3.upright: You await the fruits of the seeds you have planted spiritually and emotionally. The bond between you is expanding and you look to the future with hope. You have common dreams.
position3.reversed: The Three of Wands reversed indicates delays or disappointments in emotional progress. A spiritual state of waiting and stuckness.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is like a sailor waiting with hope for their ship returning to port.

position4.upright: The long-term result is that you reap the fruits of your joint efforts and look to the future with hope. This indicates a successful relationship that is expanding and growing.
position4.reversed: The Three of Wands inverted indicates that plans will fail and disappointment will occur in the long run. Expectations are not met.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a hopeful expectation with bright opportunities appearing on the horizon.

position1.upright: This person is celebrating an achievement or important event. There is stability, harmony and happiness in your life. He may be looking for a celebration, engagement, marriage or just a happy union with you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Four of Wands indicates that this person is experiencing a situation of disharmony, instability, or postponement of celebration in their home or family life. The foundations may not be solid.
position1.context: This person is a stable and cheerful soul who celebrates life's happy moments.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is joyful, harmonious, and worth celebrating. Sexuality is a celebration of a happy union between two people. The energy of a honeymoon or a passionate getaway.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Four of Wands indicates disharmony or instability in sexual life. Physical connection does not provide the expected joy and feeling of celebration.
position2.context: Your sex life is a joyful and passionate festival celebrating the coming together of two people.

position3.upright: There is an emotional bond between you that is stable, happy, and worth celebrating. You feel at home when we are together. It is a spiritual home and a safe haven.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Four of Wands indicates emotional instability or disharmony. Your spiritual foundation is not solid and there is no sense of celebration.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a joyful and solid structure that celebrates the coming together of two souls.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a stable, happy and celebration-filled union. This means marriage, living together or creating a happy home.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Four of Wands indicates that the relationship may not be on solid ground in the long run due to instability or fundamental incompatibilities.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is a happy and solid future to be celebrated together.

position1.upright: This person is in a rivalry, conflict, or disagreement. Different ideas collide and an ego war may be occurring. It can also reflect this competitive and chaotic energy into the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates that this person has realized the futility of a conflict, is trying to compromise, or is regretting a past fight. He may be seeking peace.
position1.context: This person is in the middle of a battlefield where ideas and egos collide.

position2.upright: There's competition, playful friction, or too much raw energy in your sex life. This can indicate passionate and energetic sexuality, but it can also turn into a conflict. The collision of different desires.
position2.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates avoidance of sexual conflict, repressed desire, or sexual fatigue. Competition has given way to reluctance.
position2.context: Your sexuality is a playful yet chaotic space where energies and desires collide.

position3.upright: There is competition, friction, or a clash of different energies in your emotional connection. This can be a passionate dynamic, but it is also spiritually draining. It takes effort to understand each other.
position3.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates that you are experiencing an internal conflict or are avoiding an emotional battle. This creates repressed tension.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is a field of energetic chaos where different ideas and passions collide.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will be in constant conflict, competition and friction. This is an exhausting dynamic that drains your energy.
position4.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates that avoiding a major conflict in the long run and sweeping problems under the carpet will end the relationship. The pent-up tension explodes.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a never-ending war with no winners.

position1.upright: This person has achieved success, received recognition, and is enjoying the victory. He has high self-confidence and is supported by those around him. He may see you as a part of his victory.
position1.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates that this person has experienced a defeat, is feeling unappreciated, or has lost self-confidence. Its success may be temporary or spurious.
position1.context: This person is a hero who won his fight and celebrates his victory in front of the public.

position2.upright: A satisfying and successful sexual life. Partners please each other and this increases self-confidence. Appreciation of sexual performance and feeling of victory.
position2.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates a feeling of failure, performance anxiety, or lack of appreciation in sexual life. One party's ego crushing the other.
position2.context: Your physical connection is a successful conquest where both parties feel victorious.

position3.upright: You support each other emotionally and celebrate your successes. There is a sense of triumph and appreciation among you. This is a motivating spiritual connection that increases self-confidence.
position3.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates that there is a lack of recognition between you or one party is jealous of the other's success. Spiritual support is lacking.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is two allies who honor each other and carry each other to victory.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a shared victory and a successful relationship that is appreciated by society. Together you will shine and gain self-confidence.
position4.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates a relationship that will end in long-term failure or one party overshadowing the other. A decline in public opinion.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is a brilliant victory that everyone will envy.

position1.upright: This person is bravely defending something he believes in or his position. He may be struggling alone against difficulties and competition. He tries to protect his own space and boundaries in the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that this person has given up the fight, admitted defeat, or is feeling overwhelmed. His defenses may have been broken.
position1.context: This person is a warrior alone on the hill, fighting against those below for what he believes in.

position2.upright: A state of sexual self-defense or maintaining boundaries. Resistance from one party to the sexual approaches of the other. A passionate challenge or sexual struggle.
position2.reversed: Reversed Seven of Wands, defeat in a sexual struggle, loss of sexual self-confidence, or feeling vulnerable. The fatigue felt when limits are exceeded.
position2.context: Your sexual energy is a struggle in which someone passionately defends their space and desires.

position3.upright: You defend this emotional bond together against external factors or challenges. There is a courageous spiritual partnership between you, fighting for the values ‚Äã‚Äãyou believe in.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that you are feeling emotionally overwhelmed by external pressures or have given up advocating for each other. You are spiritually tired.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is an unshakable fortress that stands together against difficulties.

position4.upright: In the long run, you will need to constantly defend your relationship against external factors and challenges. This is a tiring but potentially successful challenge.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that the relationship will end in the long run by succumbing to external pressures or difficulties. You lose the fight.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a resistance that requires constant defense and struggle.

position1.upright: This person is experiencing rapid developments, sudden news or a journey in his life. Events are progressing rapidly. There may be rapid communication or rapid progress in the relationship with you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates delays, obstacles, or misunderstandings in this person's life. Speed ‚Äã‚Äãmay have slowed down and there may be a pause.
position1.context: This person has an energy full of action and communication, like arrows flying quickly towards their target.

position2.upright: A fast, passionate and exciting sexual energy. Events can develop quickly. Passionate messaging, sudden meetings and a high sexual tempo.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates a slowdown, delay, or mistiming in sexual energy. Passionate messages may go unanswered or sexual intercourse may be postponed. Jealousy.
position2.context: Your physical connection is an unstoppable energy, like arrows of passion speeding towards their target.

position3.upright: There is a rapid and exciting emotional and spiritual communication between you. Emotions are expressed clearly and quickly. This is a fast-moving, dynamic bond.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates a slowdown, misunderstanding, or delay in emotional communication. You are not on the same frequency spiritually.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is like arrows full of love and passion moving rapidly between two hearts.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a future full of rapid and exciting developments. This could be a sudden marriage proposal, moving in together, or a fast-moving relationship.
position4.reversed: The Eight of Wands reversed indicates that, in the long run, the relationship will end quickly due to poor timing, delays, or jealousy.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is a series of events that will quickly lead you to a happy ending.

position1.upright: This person is a resilient person who has been wounded by past wars but is still standing. He is ready for one last fight and does not let his guard down. Can be cautious and defensive towards relationships.
position1.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that this person no longer has the strength to fight and has given up or has exhausted himself by remaining stubbornly defensive. He may be paranoid.
position1.context: This person is a tired warrior, wounded but undefeated, preparing for one last battle.

position2.upright: A cautious and defensive stance due to past sexual disappointments. A wall may have been erected against sexual intimacy. The desire is there, but action is difficult due to lack of confidence.
position2.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that a sexual defense is no longer effective or has been overcome. Either give up completely or remain stubbornly insecure.
position2.context: Your physical connection is the energy of a warrior who has been hurt in the past and is afraid of being hurt again.

position3.upright: You are cautious and defensive towards each other due to past emotional wounds. There may be a trust issue between you, but there is still resistance to maintain this bond. A spiritual bond that is tired but does not give up.
position3.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that you have emotionally built up your walls even higher or that you no longer have the strength to fight. A spiritual exhaustion.
position3.context: Your emotional attachment is a weary warrior who has been wounded in the past but is still standing.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will continue tired but durable. Despite the wounds of the past, you will not give up on each other. A tiring but lasting bond.
position4.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that, in the long run, the relationship will give up at some point due to the insecurities and wounds of the past. Resistance is broken.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is a tired warrior who manages to survive despite all the wounds.

position1.upright: This person is overwhelmed by too much responsibility and burden. He may be working too hard and trying to do everything on his own. He may not have time or energy to devote to the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that this person has let go of the burdens on him, shared the responsibilities, or does not want to carry such a heavy burden anymore. There is relief.
position1.context: This person is someone who has shouldered too much burden to carry alone and is trying to achieve his goal.

position2.upright: Sexual life feels like a duty or burden rather than a source of pleasure. Stress and fatigue suppress libido and sexual desire.
position2.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that a burden or pressure in sexual life is being relieved. Sexual energy can be revived as responsibilities decrease.
position2.context: Your sexual life is an energy that has lost its pleasure and has been crushed under the other burdens of life.

position3.upright: This emotional bond has become a burden or responsibility rather than a pleasure. One or both parties are being crushed under the weight of the relationship. It's mentally exhausting.
position3.reversed: The reversed Ten of Wands indicates that you are starting to let go of the emotional burdens between you. This allows the relationship to lighten up and breathe spiritually.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond has become a heavy burden that is difficult to carry.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will turn into a heavy burden rather than a pleasure. Responsibilities and pressures can destroy love and passion.
position4.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that the relationship will end under this burden in the long run, or that one party will abandon all responsibility.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a heavy responsibility that has become impossible to bear.

position1.upright: This person is a young soul who is adventurous, enthusiastic, energetic and open to new ideas. He likes to explore and try new things. It may bring you an exciting message or a proposal for adventure.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates that this person is aimless, indecisive, or unable to make a start. It can bring bad news or disappointment.
position1.context: This person is an energetic and enthusiastic messenger, ready to explore the world with a wand in hand.

position2.upright: An enthusiasm for new sexual experiences and a desire for adventure. A flirtatious, energetic and passionate debut. A sexually exploratory and fun energy.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates indecision in making a sexual initiation or immature sexual energy. He has passion but doesn't know where to direct it.
position2.context: Your physical connection is an energetic and passionate explorer, eager to embark on new adventures.

position3.upright: A new passion, excitement and spiritual curiosity is blooming between you. You are eager to discover each other and embark on new adventures together. A fun and energetic bond.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates indecision or immature energy in making an emotional debut. There is enthusiasm but no action.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is an enthusiastic and energetic explorer at the beginning of a new adventure.

position4.upright: The long-term result is exploring and having fun, embarking on new adventures together. This is a dynamic relationship that continues with a young and energetic spirit.

position1.title: Person You Are Interested In

position2.description: The heat of attraction between you, the harmony of your body language and the balance of physical closeness. How energy flows when you are together is revealed here.
position2.title: Physical Connection

position3.description: The heart-to-heart bridge: depth of empathy, trust, and spiritual harmony. The fact that you hear each other and vibrate on the same frequency appears on this card.
position3.title: Emotional Connection

position4.description: The way the relationship matures, the potential to grow together, and the route that time suggests to you. It gives signs about patience, stability and the future picture.
position4.title: Long Term Process

credit.description: Credit will be used to record this reading. Do you want to continue?

marriage.title: Marriage Expansion

position1.upright: Your marriage will be shaped by a free start, and the result may be hope, adventure, and the opening of new paths.
position1.reversed: Unscheduledness or extreme purity can cloud the outcome of the marriage process, and hasty steps can lead to vulnerability.
position1.context: The result is the beginning of a new journey, but the lack of foundation is a risk.

position10.upright: The madman points to a new beginning freely on the journey of marriage, which opens the door to marriage with courage and pure faith.
position10.reversed: Reverse Madman says that unplanning or careless steps can delay the path to marriage, and it needs a more conscious approach.
position10.context: There is a possibility of marriage, but it requires a conscious choice and intent.

position2.upright: When you wait, be open to new experiences, live with lightness and curiosity, and your journey will give you freedom to approach the right one.
position2.reversed: Carelessness or irresponsible steps can make it difficult for you to prepare for the right person, so when you wait, focus on solid foundations instead of rootless.
position2.context: It's useful to explore life with curiosity while waiting, but instead of irresponsible steps, you need to secure the foundation.

position3.upright: Crazy points to free and flexible sharing in financial matters, which may be a bold but impulsive tendency to take steps in joint spending.
position3.reversed: Reverse Crazy shows recklessness and unprepared behavior in financial matters, which can cause problems in sharing.
position3.context: There's freedom in sharing, but disorientation can pose a risk, and it's important to find balance.

position4.upright: It represents a fresh start in commitment and a free spirit, which means that a relationship can be tried without fear, and when you say yes from the heart, the bond will turn into a pleasant journey.
position4.reversed: Reverse-Crazy points to indecision and not being ready for commitment. If one of the parties is afraid to take responsibility, the bonding process can be postponed or left on the surface.
position4.context: The desire to bond is born with courage, but it must be balanced with a sense of responsibility.

position5.upright: The likeness of looking at the world with a pure, fresh soul is strong, and you both love spontaneousness and discovery; it's good for you to learn together.
position5.reversed: One may need more freedom, the other may need more security. If there is no balance of planlessness, the common rhythm is forced.
position5.context: The love of discovery is a common area, and the need for tempo and security can vary, and when the balance is set, the harmony improves.

position6.upright: The mad card shows that your family can meet you with a fresh and unprejudiced energy. You are a different and free spirit to them; your originality can make curiosity and acceptance easier. Your sincere and open attitude will open the doors for you.
position6.reversed: Reverse-Crazy indicates that your family may perceive you a little too irresponsible or hasty, and you may find it difficult to reassure you in the first place, and you can break that perception by showing a more serious and balanced approach.
position6.context: Your family's approach to you can be released between curiosity and caution, which will speed up the acceptance process of intimacy.

position7.upright: The madman says that your meeting will take place spontaneously and unexpectedly, and your naturality and your attitude towards flow will draw you together, and your encounter will come with surprise and light energy.
position7.reversed: Reverse Madman shows that your encounter may occur in a hasty or careless environment, a meeting that at first seems to be inconsequential can become meaningful in time, and it is important to approach without prejudice.
position7.context: Your introduction can be surprising, light and flowing, and the first impression can deepen, even if it's hasty.

position8.upright: Crazy shows that you can understand each other through openness and natural intimacy, without prejudice, preventing misunderstandings and strengthening the bond.
position8.reversed: The Reverse-Crazy says that talking carelessly and recklessly can make the deal difficult.
position8.context: Natural clarity adapts; carelessness can lead to misunderstandings.

position9.upright: Crazy is a man who welcomes the life of a suitable wife with lightness and joy, curious, brave and open to new experiences that keeps your bond fresh.
position9.reversed: A reverse crazy, impulsive, difficult wife to take responsibility for tells you that she's not right for you, and you need to avoid the hastyness of losing balance.
position9.context: The ideal mate embraces life with lightness and is balanced in responsibility.

position1.upright: Your marriage will find a strong basis for the power of communication and willpower, resulting in a creative and compatible partnership.
position1.reversed: Miscommunication or manipulation can weaken the healthy ground of marriage, and the result may be a process that questions trust.
position1.context: The result depends on the harmony of intent and action, transparency is essential.

position10.upright: The wizard points to your ability to reach marriage, and you can create your own destiny by expressing your wishes clearly.
position10.reversed: The Reverse Wizard may be an obstacle to marriage due to deceptive words or manipulation.
position10.context: Marriage is in your hands; honesty and focus are essential.

position2.upright: Build your own potential, activate your abilities, use the waiting process to strengthen your personal strength.
position2.reversed: It may slow you down to use disorganized energy or self-degradation, and proceed with clear intent and discipline.
position2.context: As you wait, improve your strength, stay focused, prepare you for the right person.

position3.upright: The wizard represents skill and creativity in financial matters, and you have the potential to manage your joint resources wisely.
position3.reversed: The Reverse Wizard points to problems in sharing with manipulation or deception, but without transparency, trust is damaged.
position3.context: For sharing, intelligence and skill are strong, but if you deviate from honesty, trust is lost.

position4.upright: The wizard shows that the parties can be strong in their wills and intentions to be joined together, and the right communication and determination creates a strong start to marriage.
position4.reversed: If there is a difference between what is said and what is done, it is not reassuring.
position4.context: Clear intent and consistent steps strengthen commitment.

position5.upright: There's a lot of energy in ulterior motive and binding words to action, and your communication powers are glowing.
position5.reversed: One of your styles of expression may remain magical, the other may remain suspicious, and extremism or silence will shift the common ground.
position5.context: Competitive, communication-based similarities are high, and if transparency is preserved, harmony deepens.

position6.upright: The wizard shows you that through strong communication and persuasion, you can easily accept you, that the right words and sincere attitude will help you win the heart of your family, and you can bond quickly with your impressive and reassuring energy.
position6.reversed: The Reverse Wizard says that your family may be inclined to question your intentions or your words, and if you offer yourself too flashy, your sincerity can be questioned, and a calm and transparent approach will make it easier to accept.
position6.context: Your words and attitude will be decisive in the process of acceptance, and sincerity will strengthen confidence.

position7.upright: The wizard shows that you will find each other through your power of communication and charm, your words and energy will make it special for you to meet, a conversation or a joint project can bring you closer together.
position7.reversed: The Reverse Wizard points to an introduction that begins with misunderstandings or deceptive energies, which may be lacking in clarity at first, but in time, real intentions arise, and patience and clarity will ease the process.
position7.context: Meet will be through communication, openness and intimacy will strengthen the bond.

position8.upright: The wizard shows that you have high communication power, and with clear intentions and clear words, mutual understanding becomes easier.
position8.reversed: The Reverse Wizard indicates that manipulative or exaggerated words can disrupt communication, and transparency and consistency can adapt.
position8.context: Open intentions make the deal easier; games ruin communication.

position9.upright: The sorcerer is a man of great communication, creative, and decisiveness, and a man who is in harmony with his word, he gives you confidence.
position9.reversed: A reverse wizard, manipulative, untrustworthy wife who lives in masks, shows that she is not fit for you, so avoid those who hide their true intentions.
position9.context: The ideal mate is an honest and determined man who is in harmony with his word and action.

position1.upright: In your marriage, deep understanding, insight, and inner connection will emerge, and the result may be safe and spiritual intimacy.
position1.reversed: Hidden emotions or secrets can create insecurity as a result of marriage, a lack of clarity can produce distance.
position1.context: The result is a bond based on inner harmony and intuition, but secrets can undermine confidence.

position10.upright: Mother Superior shows that marriage can be made possible through insight and deep connection, patience and internal guidance are important.
position10.reversed: Reverse Mother Superior, secrecy or hidden truths can block the way to marriage.
position10.context: Marriage will be shaped by trusting intuitive intuition.

position2.upright: Listen to your intuition and develop your inner self, and inner wisdom will prepare you for the right mate.
position2.reversed: Excessive passiveness or introvertibility can make the process difficult. Share intuition and balance open heart.
position2.context: Intuition is useful while waiting, but instead of closing, there should be sharing.

position3.upright: The Mother Superior carries the energy of intuition and secrecy in financial matters, deep thinking about resources and conscious elections are at the forefront.
position3.reversed: Reverse Mother Superior says secrecy and secrets can create mistrust in financial sharing, lack of clarity can cause problems.
position3.context: Intuition and cognitive approach to sharing are useful.

position4.upright: The High Priestess shows that the desire to be joined will be supported by inner wisdom, that by listening to the hearts of the parties, she can say yes with deep intuition.
position4.reversed: Inverted Mother Superior points to the presence of privacy and vague emotions in her desire to connect, and if not spoken clearly, the ground of the bond weakens.
position4.context: Connection becomes clear by hearing the sound of the heart.

position5.upright: It's a similar frequency intuitive, inner-world and privacy, and you understand each other even when you're silent.
position5.reversed: One of you can open up and the other can keep a secret.
position5.context: A partnership in depth and intuition, if the tendency to keep secrets separates, it needs clarity.

position6.upright: Mother Superior, it shows that at first your family can perceive you as a little distant but wise, and they will be interested in your intuitive confidence by not talking too much, and in time, your sincerity will be revealed.
position6.reversed: The upside-down Mother says that the family might find you introverted or mysterious, which may slow down the acceptance process, and openness and sharing will reduce the distance.
position6.context: Although you may seem a little closed at first, the more you share, the more the family temperature will increase.

position7.upright: The High Priestess says that your acquaintance may be based on a deep intuition or a spiritual bond, that you recognize each other with feelings, that you bond with more energy than words.
position7.reversed: Reverse Mother Superior, there may be secrecy or uncertainty in the introduction, and at first you may find it difficult to open up to each other fully, and in time, the bond deepens.
position7.context: Meeting can happen with a strong inner intuition, and in time, openness will strengthen your bond.

position8.upright: The Mother Superior shows that intuitive harmony is strong, understanding silence and recognizing internal signs makes the deal easier.
position8.reversed: Inverted Mother Superior states that extreme silence or secrets can make communication difficult, and safe openness increases harmony.
position8.context: Silent understanding has high potential; concealment disrupts harmony.

position9.upright: Abbess, for you, is a wife who is intuitive, deep-thinking, and knows how to keep secrets. Inner wisdom builds a bond in harmony.
position9.reversed: Inverted Mother Superior shows that you are unfit for a wife who is extremely mysterious, who hides her emotions, or who avoids communication.
position9.context: The ideal mate is the one who connects with intuitive, deep and reliable sharing.

position1.upright: Your marriage will be based on compassion, abundance, and productivity, and the result can be a life that grows in love.
position1.reversed: Excessive ownership or lack of self-care may reduce the peace of marriage, and the result may be an unstable bond.
position1.context: The result is a rich and compassionate bond, but the balance must be maintained.

position10.upright: The Empress says that the desire to build abundance, love, and family strengthens the potential for marriage.
position10.reversed: Reverse Empress, extreme addiction or unstable love can make marriage difficult.
position10.context: The possibility of marriage is strong; it must be fed with compassion and balance.

position2.upright: Show compassion for yourself, develop a sense of abundance and fertility, and your self-care process is ready for the mate.
position2.reversed: Disregarding extreme addiction or self-worth will make the process difficult. Learn to feed yourself first.
position2.context: Self - care and compassion are important while waiting. This prepares you for a compatible union.

position3.upright: The Empress represents abundance and generosity, and there is a abundant and supportive energy in sharing financial resources.
position3.reversed: Reverse Empress talks about overexpensive spending or unstable sharing.
position3.context: There's plenty of energy in sharing, but wastefulness can break the balance.

position4.upright: The Empress shows that commitment is based on love, compassion, and productivity, and the sides are willing to offer each other peace and security.
position4.reversed: Inverse Empress creates the risk of overclaiming or strangulation in the desire to bond, which could make it difficult to establish a permanent bond.
position4.context: Healthy bonding grows in the balance of freedom and compassion.

position5.upright: Similar tastes in maintenance, productivity, and aesthetics.
position5.reversed: Excessive ownership/impulse perception can disrupt the rhythm, and if the self-care balance is not set, satisfaction will fall.
position5.context: Feeding, sensory similarities are strong.

position6.upright: The Empress says that your family will accept you quickly with your warm, tender and nutritious energy, and the way you embrace love can affect them, and you will be the one to make your family worthy in their eyes.
position6.reversed: Reverse Empress, it shows that your family can perceive you as too possessive or too dependent, that sometimes over-appropriate behavior can create a sense of pressure on the other side, and the balanced approach will easily make you accept.
position6.context: Your kind and nutritious behavior can be quickly embraced by the family.

position7.upright: The Empress says that you will meet in an environment of compassion, warmth, and nature, and an event related to family, friends, or nature can bring you together, feeding you an intimate atmosphere.
position7.reversed: Reverse Empress, there may be over-appreciation or expectation energy in the introduction, and at first too much emotion can force you to meet, and balance and calm make it easier to meet.
position7.context: Meeting can take place in a warm, intimate, nutritious environment, and the balance of emotions is important.

position8.upright: The Empress shows that a compassionate and nutritious way of communicating will prevail.
position8.reversed: The Reverse Empress says that overclaiming or emotional imposition can cause trouble in communication.
position8.context: Compassionate communication strengthens the agreement; extremism prevents it.

position9.upright: The Empress is a caring, nutritious, productive wife for you, and her loving approach will give you peace.
position9.reversed: Reverse Empress, you're not cut out for someone who's over-addicted or jealous or neglects his own needs.
position9.context: The ideal mate is the loving one who knows how to share.

position1.upright: Your marriage will gain trust, order, and a solid structure, and the result may be a stable union.
position1.reversed: Excessive control or rigid behavior can make marriage difficult, and the result may be a oppressive pattern.
position1.context: The result is a solid and secure foundation, but extreme rigor can be a problem.

position10.upright: The Emperor supports the possibility of marriage with order, determination, and strong foundations.
position10.reversed: Reverse Emperor, control or rigor may interfere in the path of marriage.
position10.context: Marriage is carried out by safe structure and stability.

position2.upright: Set proper boundaries for your life, and while you wait, the sense of responsibility will make you mature.
position2.reversed: Excessive rigor or control can make the process difficult, and learn flexibility.
position2.context: It's useful to maintain order while waiting, but instead of rigidity, approach it in balance.

position3.upright: The Emperor demonstrates the need for order and clear rules in financial sharing, with discipline and responsibility, and resources are safe.
position3.reversed: The Reverse Emperor says that solid control or pressure can make sharing difficult.
position3.context: In sharing discipline and rules bring confidence, over control creates conflict.

position4.upright: The Emperor points out that commitment can rise above discipline, stability and strong foundations, with a serious sense of responsibility, yes.
position4.reversed: The Reverse Emperor shows that the desire to connect can be clouded by extreme control or rigid approach, and one of the parties can feel pressured.
position4.context: A solid bond is permanent with a fair balance.

position5.upright: Your values of structure, order and responsibility are similar, and rules and boundaries are peaceful.
position5.reversed: The dose of control language affects proximity.
position5.context: The search for structure and trust is common, and the more flexible it is, the more adaptive it becomes.

position6.upright: The Emperor says that your family will accept you with confidence and regularity, and it's a great advantage for them to be seen as a solid and responsible person, and your discipline and your seriousness will give them respect.
position6.reversed: The Reverse Emperor points out that the family can perceive you as too strict, stubborn, or controlling, which can create distance, which will speed up the process of acceptance by showing flexibility and softness.
position6.context: Your serious and reassuring attitude makes acceptance easier, but rigor can create distance.

position7.upright: The Emperor says that you will meet in a serious, orderly environment, that work, education, or an official process can bring you together, and trust and stability will strengthen your acquaintance.
position7.reversed: Reverse Emperor, there may be a rigidity or a controlling air in your encounter, and at first it can create a formal distance, and you can make a bond that softens over time.
position7.context: Meeting can be a serious and orderly environment, and in time, intimacy increases.

position8.upright: The Emperor shows that communication can be adapted to clear boundaries and order.
position8.reversed: The Reverse Emperor points out that a strict and bossy language will make the deal difficult, and flexibility increases harmony.
position8.context: Clear order strengthens communication; rigidity creates disconnection.

position9.upright: The Emperor is a regular, protective, and reassuring wife for you, and it gives stability to the ability to take responsibility.
position9.reversed: Reverse Emperor, someone with strict rules, controlling, or not flexible is not fit for you.
position9.context: The ideal mate is a regular, trusting, responsible person.

position1.upright: Your marriage will be supported by tradition, values, and common beliefs, and the result can be a long and reliable bond.
position1.reversed: Blind tradition or value conflicts can complicate the outcome of marriage, and differences can lead to tension.
position1.context: The result is a bond that is strengthened by common values, but strict rules can be shadow.

position10.upright: The saint points to traditional ways of marriage, family approval, and a sacred bond.
position10.reversed: Reverse Saint, traditional rules resist or incompatibility may delay the marriage path.
position10.context: The possibility of marriage is strong; it will be supported in traditional ways.

position2.upright: Strengthen your values and beliefs, and the right guidance and knowledge will guide you as you wait.
position2.reversed: Blind devotion to tradition can limit you, make your own values clear.
position2.context: It's useful to clarify your values while you're waiting, which makes it easier for you to match.

position3.upright: Aziz points to traditional methods of financial sharing, and common values and rules support harmony.
position3.reversed: Reverse Saint points to conflict of different beliefs and values in financial matters, which can't be adapted without flexibility.
position3.context: Sharing is safe in traditional ways. Different values can cause problems.

position4.upright: Aziz shows that commitment will be supported by traditional ways and values, family approval and spiritual bonds that strengthen the yes decision.
position4.reversed: Reverse Saint, value conflicts or different beliefs can be a problem in bonding, and unless it's adapted, the bond is weak.
position4.context: If commitment is supported by common values, it will be permanent.

position5.upright: Value, ethics, and ritual are similar roots, and reconciliation in the family area is easy.
position5.reversed: One can be traditional, one can be liberal, blind rule or blind rebellion creates conflict.
position5.context: There's a value-based resemblance.

position6.upright: Aziz says that family can measure you with traditional values and that it would be easy for you to accept these values, that cultural or spiritual harmony may be important to them, and that showing respect in these areas can give you confidence.
position6.reversed: Reverse Aziz shows that your family can question you because of your different views or your unorthodox behavior, which can increase the distance and balance a respectful explanation and open communication acceptance process.
position6.context: Respecting family values may be the key to acceptance.

position7.upright: Aziz points out that you will meet in a traditional or social context, a course, a religious or social organization can bring you closer together.
position7.reversed: Reverse Aziz, when you meet, different systems of belief or value may come forward, and although it may seem to be incompatible at first, these differences may draw you to each other.
position7.context: Meeting can take place in a traditional or social context, and different values can test you, but they can bond.

position8.upright: The saint shows that communication can be adapted through common values and traditions, and understanding feeds on similar perspectives.
position8.reversed: Reverse Saint says that strict rules or blind rebellion can disrupt communication.
position8.context: Common values facilitate communication; blind resistance makes it difficult.

position9.upright: Aziz, for you, the worthy mate is strong, faithful, and respectful of tradition, and common faith and values strengthen harmony.
position9.reversed: Reverse Saint, blindly bound by the rules, or the contrary, the one who defies everything is not suitable for you.
position9.context: The ideal mate is a person of value and trust.

position1.upright: Your marriage will be based on love, harmony, and mutual choice.
position1.reversed: Indecisive or value conflicts can complicate the outcome of marriage, and the result may be uncertainty and dilemma.
position1.context: The result is the unity that is rooted in a conscious choice, but the clarity of the decision is essential.

position10.upright: Lovers say that marriage is possible with a strong bond of love and harmony, and the right choice leads you to marriage.
position10.reversed: Reverse lovers, indecisive or incompatibility can prevent marriage.
position10.context: Marriage will be carried out by a heart-to-heart choice.

position2.upright: As you wait, consider your own choices and values, and when your heart is clear, the right person comes.
position2.reversed: Indecision and dilemma may prolong the process, so make your own choices first.
position2.context: Make your choices clear while you wait. This will prepare you for the right bond.

position3.upright: Lovers show that harmony and common values are at the forefront of financial sharing. Elections are held together.
position3.reversed: Reverse lovers mean dissonance in financial matters and indecisiveness.
position3.context: There's harmony and common decision-making in sharing, and indecisiveness can lead to conflict.

position4.upright: Lovers show that both sides are willing to commit from the heart, and that bond will grow stronger with common values and choices.
position4.reversed: Inverted lovers can be indecisive in the desire to connect or the attraction of different paths unless a clear choice is made, the bond will remain suspended.
position4.context: Connection is strengthened by clear choices.

position5.upright: Strong alignment of basic values, choices, and goals of life. Your heart looks at the same thing, yes.
position5.reversed: Indecisive or prior conflict can break the line, and unless the clear choice is made, the sense of resemblance weakens.
position5.context: The value is high, the clarity of the decision makes the resemblance permanent.

position6.upright: The lover's card says it will make it easier for the family to accept the harmony and love in your relationship, and your common values increase their trust, and keep showing your love in a natural and balanced way.
position6.reversed: Inverted lovers point to the possibility that the family may question your relationship or tend to take sides, and differences can complicate the process of acceptance, and displaying your determination and harmony will create confidence.
position6.context: The integrity of your relationship plays an important role in convincing the family.

position7.upright: Lovers say that you meet with a heart-to-heart choice, that you meet each other at the right time by choosing each other, and your common values bring you closer and closer.
position7.reversed: Reverse Lovers, indecision or third party may be effective when you meet, and unless a clear choice is made, your connection may be difficult to move forward.
position7.context: Meeting comes with a heart-to-heart choice, which can complicate the process.

position8.upright: Lovers show that honest talks from the heart will strengthen the agreement.
position8.reversed: Reverse lovers say that indecisiveness or double language can cause problems in communication.
position8.context: Open elections provide a deal; a double tongue creates a disconnect.

position9.upright: Lovers are the kind of man who cares about the value of a suitable wife, makes choices from the heart, and the bond with common decisions is strengthened.
position9.reversed: Reverse Lovers are not suitable for you to be indecisive, conflicting, or incompatible with values.
position9.context: The ideal mate is the one who shares common values and makes clear choices.

position1.upright: Your marriage will move forward with focus, discipline, and co-ordination, and the result may be strong and aimed at the goal.
position1.reversed: Lack of aim or conflicting direction may obscure the outcome of the marriage, and progress may be disbanded.
position1.context: The result is clear targets and a common route, but it has to be careful to swing.

position10.upright: The Chariot shows that you can reach marriage with focus and determination.
position10.reversed: Reverse Chariot, disorientation or contradictions can slow down the marriage process.
position10.context: Marriage will be possible with focused and conscious steps.

position2.upright: Make your goals clear and proceed with determination. Discipline makes you strong.
position2.reversed: Aggression or disorientation will make the process difficult.
position2.context: It's useful to determine your goals while you're waiting, and determination will prepare you.

position3.upright: The Chariot represents control and progress in financial matters, and together, success is possible by focusing on goals.
position3.reversed: The Reverse Chariot points to problems of fiscal harmony, disorientation and control, preventing the conflict from progressing.
position3.context: Focusing on the goal of sharing brings success, disorientation can lead to loss.

position4.upright: The Chariot shows that a strong bond can be established if both sides show will for the same goal.
position4.reversed: The Reverse Chariot is a risk of being drawn in different directions or in a conflict of control, and if it's not adapted, the road becomes difficult.
position4.context: It's easier to make a common point than to connect.

position5.upright: You're similar to the focus of progress, target and discipline, and the common course calls you to the same speed.
position5.reversed: The speed and method of difference stretch the rope, and the wheel fight disrupts the harmony.
position5.context: There's a target-focused resemblance. Speed/tempo match required.

position6.upright: The Chariot shows that your family will accept you because of your firm and strong stance, your clear goals and desire for progress are a reassuring sign, and your strong will can give them courage.
position6.reversed: The Reverse Chariot indicates that your family may perceive you as too hasty, overbearing, or undirected, and that perception can make the acceptance process difficult, and a moderate and calm stance will build confidence.
position6.context: Your firm but balanced attitude helps you gain the trust of your family.

position7.upright: The Chariot shows that you will meet through movement and travel, moving, or a common goal can bring you together.
position7.reversed: The Reverse Chariot, there may be disorientation or opposition in your meeting, different targets can create distance in the beginning, but they can be overcome by harmony.
position7.context: Acquaintances are connected to travel or movement, and adaptability makes the process easier.

position8.upright: The Chariot shows that it's possible to negotiate with focused communication, and to move towards a common goal strengthens ties.
position8.reversed: The Reverse Chariot says that sloppy or oppressive style can disrupt communication.
position8.context: Focused communication brings harmony; sloppyness makes the deal difficult.

position9.upright: The Chariot is a determined, ambitious, target-oriented wife for you, and you're inspired by the desire to lead life.
position9.reversed: Reverse Chariot, undirected, sloppy, or over-pressive is not a good fit for you.
position9.context: The ideal mate is determined and faithful to his goals.
